properties.name: Chapman Social Anhedonia Scale
properties.definition_text: assesses deficits in the ability to experience pleasure from non physical stimuli such as other people, talking, exchanging expressions of feelings (e.g., âA car ride is much more enjoyable if someone is with me.â). (from http://www.columbia.edu/cu/ssw/projects/pmap/docs/chmielewski_chapman.pdf)
